== Partition Managers ==

=== GParted ===

* <nowiki>[[GParted]]</nowiki> -- recommended. Gnome-based but can be used in any desktop or as a LiveCD.

=== Parted ===

* Parted -- the GNU parted partition manager. Install the <nowiki>[[apt:parted|parted]]</nowiki> package.

=== Partition Manager ===

* Partition Manager (for KDE/Kubuntu). Install the <nowiki>[[apt:partitionmanager|partitionmanager]]</nowiki> package from the Universe repository.
